item.title: He's Got The Whole World In His Hands - Ukulele Play Along Video - Very Easy - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele Play Along - Very Easy
He's Got The Whole World In His Hands - Nursery Rhyme
Using the chords: C and G7
Suggested Strum Pattern - D D D D
Ideal for younger children in primary or elementary school. This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: The Thanksgiving Song - Ukulele Play Along (no lyrics) - Key of C
item.description:
**The same play along song, but with lyrics, may be found here - https://youtu.be/ch5pyySDpEs .
Now Thank We All Our God (Nun Danket), also known as the Thanksgiving Hymn or the Hymn of Thanksgiving. For educational use. Chords Used: C F Dm G G7 Am Em A
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Crowder - All My Hope - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: G Am C D7 A7
All My Hope by David Crowder. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Hillsong United - Oceans - Baritone Ukulele - Key of Am
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of Am. Transposed down a whole step from the original.
Chords Used: Am, G, C, F, Dm
As performed by Hillsong United.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/NNKFehiIFGg
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion background is from www.churchmotiongraphics.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Lauren Daigle - You Say - Baritone Ukulele - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of G (raised a whole step)
As performed by Lauren Daigle.
See the tutorial video (CGEA): https://youtu.be/MePYwvHpd8M
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The baritone ukulele chord font is based on Chordette for Education (for GCEA ukulele) which is available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.

item.description:

item.title: Angels We Have Heard on High (Wilson) Ukulele Play Along - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G. There is a key change in the original; I have modified the file to remain in G.
As performed by Josh Wilson.
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: When the Saints Go Marching In - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by Kids-Songs.TV. It is nearly impossible to find a version of this song in C that uses only 3 chords and stays in C! This is a transposed (from D) and shortened version of the original video.
Original video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=giiK_lYsR0Q
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com. The colored font matches Aquila KIDS ukulele strings.

item.title: Laurie London - He's Got the Whole World in His Hands - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by Laurie London
Original video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cqb3NSiSwoc
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com. The colored font matches Aquila KIDS ukulele strings.
